channel.title: Case Numbers
channel.description: Is there a website out there that has all the Case Id's for textHandler and teleports and what not? If there is, just post the link if you know it. Thanks

item.title: Case Numbers

item.title: Case Numbers
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

For teleports, here’s a good link.

http://rspscodes.synthasite.com/

It has emotes, objects, items, npcs, interfaces etc…

If you’re looking for clicking button ID’s, best thing to do would be to print it where the button is processed.

System.out.println("Button clicked: "+buttonClicked);

Same applies for objects, npcs and everything else.

Read full topic

item.title: Case Numbers
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I highly doubt there would be a site; even if there were, it probably would have different ids due to base differences. Also, this sounds like hard coding, as most of the text for interfaces is usually handled by the cache, or at least if it is done the most efficient way.

Read full topic

item.title: Case Numbers
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

In Delta, you have textHandler.Java for all the text on the buttons for example, if you wanted the Varrock teleport to say Varrock, then you put c.sendQuest(“Varrock”, 7332); and 7332 = Case number

Read full topic

item.title: Case Numbers
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

What do you mean by textHandler?

Read full topic

item.title: Case Numbers
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

Is there a website out there that has all the Case Id’s for textHandler and teleports and what not? If there is, just post the link if you know it. Thanks

Read full topic
